DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : COMPANY TOWN ANNEX
DOC.TEXT: CBS Executive Moves to Cable : Rod Perth , head of late-night programming at the network since 1989 and one of the executives who helped hire David Letterman away from NBC , was named programming chief at cable_television ' s USA Networks . In his position as president of USA Networks Entertainment , Perth will be responsible_for the development and production of programming for USA Network , the Sci-Fi Channel and USA Pictures . He will be based in Los Angeles and will report to USA Networks Chairman Kay Koplovitz .
